definition: to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: Thee sandglass remembers the time we lost.
sentences.chinese: 㦱沙漏記得，我們遺忘的時光。

sentences.english: The sandglass remember the time we lost.
sentences.chinese: 沙漏記得我們失去的時間。

sentences.english: As I get old day by day, I really find the speed of sand lapsing in my sandglass accelerated.
sentences.chinese: 隨着人年紀增長，我覺得時間的沙漏好像越流越快。

sentences.english: In Beijing, where sells a sandglass ?
The sandglass remembers the time we lest.
sentences.chinese: 沙漏記得，我們以往的時光。

sentences.english: The sands of time are running out for the central star of this the Hourglass Nebula.
sentences.chinese: 對沙漏星雲中的中央恆星來說，時間的沙粒正在流逝。

sentences.english: The hourglass silhouette will be de rigueur for fashionistas next season.
sentences.chinese: 沙漏性輪廓將是下一季的潮流之一。

sentences.english: This elegant goddess-style dress in red will set off your hourglass figure or give you curves if you don't already have them.
sentences.chinese: 這件廓型的優雅紅色小禮服將體現你沙漏般完美線條。

sentences.english: So, after glass blowing was invented, the hourglass came into use.
sentences.chinese: 所以玻璃吹制技術發明以後，沙漏開始使用。

sentences.english: The sandglass remember the time we.
Jesus tells us, the sand in the top hourglass is all that counts.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌教導我們說，惟有沙漏上端之沙纔有價值。

sentences.english: Tis visible silence, still as the hour-glass.
sentences.chinese: 這可見的沉靜，沙漏一般的沉靜。

sentences.english: With the hands of the hourglass, if the time can let me play with it.
sentences.chinese: 把玩着手中的沙漏，如果時間也可以任我把玩就好了。

sentences.english: Because the sandglass remembers the time we lost.
sentences.chinese: 因爲沙漏記得，我們遺忘的時光。

sentences.english: The sandglass remembers the time lost!
sentences.chinese: 沙漏記得，皒門遺忘旳時光。

sentences.english: People used a sandglass to measure cooking time.
sentences.chinese: 人們用沙漏來衡量做飯時間。

definition: to measure time/to time/to reckon by time
(onom.) pattering sound/drip drip (of water)/tick tock (of clock)/also pr. [di1 da5]
